attributes.action: Reinstate school places for pupils who’ve been forced to deregister.
attributes.additional_details: Many parents have been forced and pressured into removing their children from schools during the covid 19 pandemic. Many would never have chosen home education in normal times, but due to governments black and white policy that “All children must attend school as normal”, and the pressure and threats from L.A’s and School leaders regarding fines/prosecution even for families with CEV and CV member, these families have been backed into a corner and many have had to take the knee jerk reaction.
attributes.background: Ensure all pupils school places are reinstated to their original school.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/551464
